Tinley_Park.Tinley Park \u2013 80th Avenue station: Tinley Park – 80th Avenue Station is one of two commuter railroad stations along Metra's Rock Island District Line in Tinley Park, Illinois, United States. The station is officially located on 18001 South 80th Avenue, lies 25.1 miles (40.4 km) away from LaSalle Street, the northern terminus of the line. Parking is available on both sides of the tracks.
